name: Unofficial WordPress.com Google Maps Shortcode
author: fonglh

sections.description:
Unofficial plugin to replicate the Google Maps shortcode function on WordPress.com sites. Useful for users who are migrating from WordPress.com to self hosted WordPress.org sites and want their maps to continue working. This feature is explained at http://en.support.wordpress.com/google-maps/

Main benefits include:

  • Import your posts from WordPress.com without having to edit all your maps.
  • Continue adding maps to posts the way you used to do it.
  • Support for custom width and height settings.
sections.installation:
1. Upload unofficial-wordpresscom-google-maps-shortcode.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use as if you’re using Google Maps in WordPress.com. See instructions at WordPress.com Google Maps page.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • (29 Sep 2011) Fixed warning about “Missing argument 2 for flh_wpcomgms_search_map_code()”

1.0

  • (31 Aug 2011) First Release.
